remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結中的資料處理作業期間發生錯誤時引發事件（例如，格式或剖析作業會擲回的例外狀況或資料來源的更新失敗時）。The event is raised when an error occurs during a data processing operation in a data-bound (for example, when a format or parse operation throws an exception or the update of the data source fails). 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來顯示資訊有關在訊息方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to display information about a in a message box. 此程式碼是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This code is part of a larger example provided in the class overview topic.
